name: Dragons of Elanthia
blurb: Climb aboard an ancient dragon and blast your enemies out of the skies in this high-flying multiplayer shooter!

rewards.reward: DRAGON FODDER \r\n==============================\r\nThank you for your support! A pledge of $10 gets you guaranteed beta access, a special DRAGON FODDER badge on our official forums, and the in-game title of "Dragon Fodder"!

EARLY BIRD TIER - INITIATE ============================== \r\nIn this tier we'll match your contribution with $20 of in-game currency, and we'll include your name in the list of backers on our website. You'll also get guaranteed beta access, a special INITIATE badge on our official forums, and the in-game title of "Initiate"!

INITIATE \r\n==============================\r\nIn this tier we'll match your contribution with $20 of in-game currency, and we'll include your name in the list of backers on our website. You'll also get guaranteed beta access, a special INITIATE badge on our official forums, and the in-game title of "Initiate"!

EARLY BIRD TIER - APPRENTICE ==============================\r\nThis tier gets you a slick $40 of in-game currency, and a spot in the in-game credits! You also get guaranteed beta access, a special APPRENTICE badge on our official forums, the in-game title of "The Apprentice," and inclusion in the list of backers on the Dragons of Elanthia website.

APPRENTICE\r\n==============================\r\nThis tier gets you a slick $40 of in-game currency, and a spot in the in-game credits! You also get guaranteed beta access, a special APPRENTICE badge on our official forums, the in-game title of "The Apprentice," and inclusion in the list of backers on the Dragons of Elanthia website.

EARLY BIRD TIER - TRAINER ==============================\r\nIn this tier we'll give you $60 of in-game currency AND early access to new dragons and riders as we create them! You'll also get added to our list of match sponsors, whose names will be selected randomly to display at the end of each match throughout beta! You'll also get guaranteed beta access, a special TRAINER badge on our official forums, the in-game title of "The Trainer," a spot in both the in-game credits and the backer list on our website.

TRAINER\r\n==============================\r\nIn this tier we'll give you $60 of in-game currency AND early access to new dragons and riders as we create them!  You'll also get added to our list of match sponsors, whose names will be selected randomly to display at the end of each match throughout beta! You'll also get guaranteed beta access, a special TRAINER badge on our official forums, the in-game title of "The Trainer," a spot in both the in-game credits and the backer list on our website.

ADEPT ============================== A $75 pledge gets you $95 of in-game currency, and you will automatically receive a bonus pack of artifacts (read: sweet power-ups for your riders and dragons) after your first win each day (every day for as long as you play), as well as Kickstarter-only customization options for how other players see your dragon! Specifically, how they look up at your glorious countenance on the post-game screen. Also, you'll still get guaranteed beta access, early access to new dragons and riders, a special ADEPT badge on our official forums, the in-game title of "The Adept," a spot on our match sponsor list, the in-game credits, and the website's backer list!

KNIGHT\r\n============================== At the Knight level, you get $130 of in-game currency, bonus artifacts after your first and second wins of the day, every day, for as long as you play. You'll also receive some awesome Kickstarter-only skins for your riders and dragons! And of course, you also get guaranteed beta access, early access to new riders and dragons, Kickstarter-only customization options, a special KNIGHT badge on our official forums, the in-game title of "The Knight," and spots in the match sponsor list, the in-game credits, and the website's backer list.

RELIC HUNTER ============================== At this tier, you get $325 of in-game currency, and you will get bonus artifacts after your first three wins of the day (every day, as long as you play). And of course, you also get guaranteed beta access, early access to new riders and dragons, Kickstarter-only customization options, Kickstarter-only skins for your riders and dragons, a special RELIC HUNTER badge on our official forums, a matching in-game title, and spots in the match sponsor list, the in-game credits, and the website's backer list.

ARCHMAGUS
============================== Here's where it starts getting interesting: At this tier, you get $650 of in-game currency and a custom in-game monument in one of our maps!

And of course, you also get guaranteed beta access, early access to new riders and dragons, bonus artifacts with your first three wins daily, Kickstarter-only customization options, Kickstarter-only skins for your riders and dragons, a special ARCHMAGUS badge on our official forums, a matching in-game title, and spots in the match sponsor list, the in-game credits, and the website's backer list.

DRAGON PRIEST\r\n============================== \r\nPledging at the Dragon Priest tier grants you not only a custom in-game monument in one of our maps, but a chance to participate in a design conference call! Oh, and $1,300 of in-game currency! And of course, you also get guaranteed beta access, early access to new riders and dragons, bonus artifacts from your first three wins every day, Kickstarter-only customization options, Kickstarter-only skins for your riders and dragons, a special DRAGON PRIEST badge on our official forums, a matching in-game title, and spots in the match sponsor list, the in-game credits, and the website's backer list.

DRAGON LORD ============================== This is where it gets truly ridiculous. $6,500 of in-game currency for starters! Also, as if that wasn't enough, you'll be a guest of honor at the Dragons of Elanthia launch party! And of course, you will also receive guaranteed beta access, automatic early access to every new dragon and hero for life, a custom in-game monument in one of our maps, a chance to participate in a design conference call, bonus artifacts from your first three wins daily, Kickstarter-only customization options, Kickstarter-only skins for your riders and dragons, a special DRAGON LORD badge on our official forums, a matching in-game title, and spots in the match sponsor list, the in-game credits, and the website's backer list.

DRAGON MASTER ============================== $13,000 of in-game currency... which is a LOT. You'll get EXCLUSIVE EARLY ACCESS to a Dragon or rider YOU help design!  You'll be a guest of honor at the Dragons of Elanthia launch party! And of course, you will also receive guaranteed beta access, automatic early access to every new dragon and hero for life, a custom in-game monument in one of our maps, a chance to participate in a design conference call (probably about your personalized dragon!), bonus artifacts from your first three wins every day, Kickstarter-only customization options, Kickstarter-only skins for your riders and dragons, a special DRAGON MASTER badge on our official forums, a matching in-game title, and spots in the match sponsor list, the in-game credits, and the website's backer list.
